title: Wireless Earbuds
description: High-quality Bluetooth earbuds with noise cancellation.

title: Smart Watch
description: Track fitness, calls, and notifications seamlessly.

title: Wireless Headphones Audio Technica
description: HYBRID ACTIVE NOISE CANCELLING: Thanks to the combination of 2 internal and 2 external microphones, the headphones detect external noise, such as aircraft and car noise, and reduce them extremely effectively by up to 90%.;HIGH PRECISION SOUND PROFILE: Noise cancelling headphones feature dynamic 40mm drivers that produce detailed sound and rich beats with BassUp technology. They are also compatible with Hi-Res certified audio via AUX cable to provide more details.

title: Smart Ring 7-days battery life
description: [FIND YOUR PERFECT SIZE BEFORE YOU BUY] - FITTR HART X2 Smart Ring sizes are different from other smart ring sizes. First, purchase a ring sizing kit, wear it for 24 hours, and then choose your appropriate size before purchasing the HART Ring X2. Available in 8 sizes from 6-13 and also comes in 3 stylish colours - Gunmetal Black, Sterling Gold, Silver.

title: Air-Fryer-Kent 4.2L
description:
Fry, Grill, Roast, Steam, and Bake your favorite snacks with KENT Classic Hot Air Fryer
The appliance uses up to 80% less oil and offers the similar taste as of deep-frying
